topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a99ff263687238fd000312#post_55a99ff263687238fd000312
I spend the past _nine-and-a-half years_ tracking the progress of the New Horizons mission, since it freaking launched.

I DID A SCIENCE FAIR PROJECT ON IT IN FOURTH GRADE, AND I WAS PRETTY POPULAR WITH THE JUDGES THAT YEAR, AND THAT WHEN THE MISSION BEGAN BACK IN EARLY 2006!

*I WAS YEARS AHEAD OF MY TIME*

And now it's all finally paid off, and I am so pleased with myself. _Childhood goal fulfilled._

topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a9a5bb6368723447004886#post_55a9a5bb6368723447004886
>As I write this, my children are asleep in their room, Loretta Lynn is on the stereo, and my wife is out on a date with a man named Paulo. It’s her second date this week; her fourth this month so far. If it goes like the others, she’ll come home in the middle of the night, crawl into bed beside me, and tell me all about how she and Paulo had sex. I won’t explode with anger or seethe with resentment. I’ll tell her it’s a hot story and I’m glad she had fun. It’s hot because she’s excited, and I’m glad because I’m a feminist.

what a fucking dipshit waste of life cuck

i wish him many a diseases in his future
